This amateurish caper, based on the novel by Alistair MacLean, is Goldfinger at sea — without James Bond, Pussy Galore or a decent villain.引用:AGGRESSIVE ARCHIVE FORCEBRINGS YOUGolden.Rendezvous.1977.DVDRip.XviD-aAFGolden Rendezvous (1977)Also Known As: Nuclear TerrorRELEASE INFORMATIONRelease Date: 2011.03.17DVD Date: 2011.01.12Theatre Date: 1977.12.25File Size: 2 x 700 MBRar Files: 2 x 50 x 15 MBSource: DVDVideo Format: XVIDVideo Bitrate: 1823 kbit/s 2pass VBRVideo Resolution: 576 x 432Video Aspect: 1.333Frame Rate: 25.000Video Length: 1:41:27Audio Format: VBR MP3 @ 48000 HzAudio Bitrate: 94 kbpsLanguage: EnglishGenre: Crime | ThrillerIMDb Rating: 6.1/10URL:http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0076091/PLOTBased on bestselling author Alistair MacLean s novel ofintrigue and mystery, Golden Rendezvous is a heady mix ofaction and suspense set on the high seas of the CaribbeanOceanAboard the converted passenger liner SS Campari, Chief OfficerJohn Carter (Richard Harris, Gladiator) senses something isdrastically afoot after sabotage is attributed to a successionof unfortunate delays. When a crew member goes missing therising mood of jeopardy suddenly turns violent, thrusting thewhole ship into instant turmoil. Armed with an atomic devicemaster criminal Luis Carreras (John Vernon, The Outlaw JoseyWales) hijacks the ship and intends to ransom his wealthypassengers for the golden contents of a US Treasury shipWith the stakes raised, it is up to Carter and his rag-tagcrew to overcome the odds and rescue the hostages before timeruns out. Featuring character stalwarts Burgess Meredith(Rocky) and Gordon Jackson (The Whistle Blower), GoldenRendezvous speeds along in the gripping tradition of Die Hardand Under SiegeCASTRichard Harris ....
